toyList.name: Excavator
toyList.description: Remote controlled excavator toy with movable boom. Able to pick up sand and dirt!

toyList.name: Dumptruck
toyList.description: Remote controlled dumptruck with movable loader. Able to carry sand and dirt form one site to the next!

toyList.name: Backhoe
toyList.description: Remote controlled backhoe with movable loader and pusher. Able to push sand and dirt!

toyList.name: Crane
toyList.description: Remote controlled crane with movable hook. Able to carry heavy loads!
